Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a cream-coloured pottery jar, the interior is spotted with a yellow-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of three lines of red-painted Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394158) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394158)
